name: Sanding Out Of Time
description:
Team Name
Ukra[i]ndom Squad

Gameplay Instructions
Complete movement challenges & solve puzzles to collect all details of mechanism that will help you to get out of mysterious hourglass, but remember that time is always running out... Don`t have enough time? Switch to another side and try to be faster this time!

W, A, S, D: Move
Spacebar: JumpLeft Ctrl: WalkMouse Wheel Up/Down: Zoom in/out

Esc: Restart menu (if you press it, you can't unpause the game, oopsies)

On level pick-ups:
Spacebar while in air: Double JumpLeft Shift: Dash
Hold RMB: Aim with hookLMB while aiming: Shoot hook

NOTE: As it is an Epic MegaJam version of the game, it has some shortcomings that make your gaming experience harder than it should be. If you want to start having fun at once, press CTRL + SHIFT + ALT + G to instantly gain all the available movement abilities.

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
Base character mesh (without cloth and textures) from Stylized Character Kit: Casual 01
All animations from mixamo
Font CaveatBrush-Regular.ttf from Gogle Fonts
Desert Texture from Megascans
Surface Trails from marketplace

Music themes is made during jam
Sounds:
Double_Jump
Sand_Step
Sand_Landing
Hook_Shout
Jetpack
Metal_Walk
Desert_ambient
Sounds from Freesounds.org

Link to Gameplay Footage

Which Engine version did you use to create your entry?
Unreal Engine 4.27.2
